data.eml:eml: New species and subspecies of the genus Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V. (2015): New species and subspecies of the genus Lesteva Latreille, 1797 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae) from Taiwan. Zootaxa 4032 (3): 333-338, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.3.10
